flawed_nl_solution:
The number of roses in the bunch is 2/5 * 40 flowers = <<2/5*40=200/2>>200/2 flowers
The total number of roses and tulips is 200/2 flowers + 10 flowers = <<200/2+10=110>>110 flowers
There were 40 flowers - 110 flowers = <<40-110=-70>>-70 carnations
#### -70

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16, not 200/2. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
